alert.note: Alert for Garfield; Grant (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 05 at 4:15AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Grant and western Garfield Counties through 445 AM CDT... At 415 AM CDT, doppler radar was tracking an area of strong thunderstorms extending from 4 miles west of Medford to 5 miles southeast of Carrier. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Enid, Medford, Waukomis, Pond Creek, Lahoma, Wakita, Kremlin, Breckenridge, Nash, Hunter, Fairmont, Hillsdale, Manchester, Carrier, Jefferson, Renfrow, Vance Air Force Base, and North Enid. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
